com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate

Class AbstractTranslator<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate.AbstractTranslator<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Translator<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ListNodeTranslator, MapNodeTranslator, PropertyValueNodeTranslator

    public abstract class AbstractTranslator<T>
extends Object
implements Translator<T>

    Very simple helper for all kinds of translators.

    Author:
    Jeff Schnitzer

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public final T load(Node node,
     LoadContext ctx)
        Description copied from interface: Translator

        Loads the content of the specified node, returning the pojo equivalent.

        There is one special return value: If a Result is returned, the content of the Result will be used instead, but delayed until ctx.done() is called. This happens at the end of a "round" of load operations and is the magic trick that makes populating entity references work efficiently.

        Specified by:
        load in interface Translator<T>
        Parameters:
        node - is the part of the entity tree we are transforming.
        ctx - holds state information during an entity load.
        Returns:
        an assembled pojo corresponding to the node subtree; if null is returned, that is the real value!
        See Also:
        LoadEngine

      • save

        public final Node save(T pojo,
        Path path,
        boolean index,
        SaveContext ctx)
        Description copied from interface: Translator
        Translates the pojo into an EntityNode format. Note that all stored values (even terminal properties) are associated with a node.
        Specified by:
        save in interface Translator<T>
        Parameters:
        pojo - is an object from the pojo entity graph; possibly the whole graph
        path - is the path that the entitynode will be created with - the path to the pojo
        index - is whether the instruction so far is to index or not index property values
        Returns:
        an EntityNode relevant to the pojo
